issue.title: [Website] Arrow for R cheatsheet blog post
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16244](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16244). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A blog post for the arrow-site to highlight the first version of the [Arrow for R cheatsheet](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/cheatsheet/arrow-cheatsheet.pdf).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16244?focusedCommentId=17525340) by Stephanie Hazlitt (stephhazlitt):*
PR available here: https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/204
